verses.name: 2 Samuel 18:5
verses.text: And the king commanded Joab and Abishai and Ittai, saying, Deal gently for my sake with the young man, even with Absalom. And all the people heard when the king gave all the captains charge concerning Absalom.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 18:6
verses.text: So the people went out into the field against Israel: and the battle was in the wood of Ephraim;

verses.name: 2 Samuel 18:7
verses.text: Where the people of Israel were slain before the servants of David, and there was there a great slaughter that day of twenty thousand men.
